short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly convert highlighted prices on the web, with customizable preferences and support for fiat and crypto currencies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Selection Converter - Your Instant Currency Transformer for the Web!

Tired of manually converting prices on the web? Look no further! Selection Converter is your sleek and efficient solution for hassle-free currency conversion right at your fingertips.

üåê Seamless Integration
Highlight any price on the web, and Selection Converter instantly springs into action. This intuitive chrome extension detects the amount and currency symbol or code, providing you with a real-time conversion in a compact popup window.

üí∏ Customize Your Experience
Tailor Selection Converter to match your preferences. With a user-friendly toolbar menu, easily toggle the extension on and off as needed. Set your preferred base currency for accurate and personalized conversions. Whether you're dealing with fiat currencies or exploring the world of cryptocurrencies, Selection Converter has you covered.

üöÄ Effortless and Precise
Say goodbye to tedious calculations and cumbersome currency converters. Selection Converter streamlines the process, ensuring that your selected price is converted accurately and promptly. No more switching tabs or searching for external tools ‚Äì it's all right there when you need it.

üåç Global Compatibility
Selection Converter supports a wide range of the most common fiat currencies and popular cryptocurrencies, ensuring that you can convert prices from around the globe effortlessly. Stay in control of your finances, no matter where your online journey takes you.

üéâ Enhance Your Browsing Experience
Make online shopping, travel planning, and financial research a breeze with Selection Converter. Empower yourself with instant currency insights, allowing you to make informed decisions without missing a beat.

üîê Privacy First
Rest easy knowing that Selection Converter respects your privacy. It only activates when you highlight a price, and no sensitive data is stored. Enjoy the benefits of a powerful tool without compromising your security.

Upgrade your web browsing experience with Selection Converter ‚Äì the must-have chrome extension for anyone navigating the dynamic world of online currencies. Download now and simplify the way you convert prices on the web!
